Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Enacts the omnibus telecommunications reform act
Summary: Enacts the "omnibus telecommunications reform act"; reforms the competitive cable service; promotes the wide-spread development of high-capacity broadband internet access; increases the availability and quality of services in this key economic development area; ensures the safety, reliability and affordability of telecommunications services.
LawCode: Ren Art 11 §§4000, 4001 & 4002 to be Art 12 §§4200, 4201 & 4202, add Art 11 §§4100 - 4120, §2808, Pub Auth L; amd Pub Serv L, generally; add §32-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the public service law, and the executive law, in relation to reforming the telecommunications sector of the New York economy, by creating a broadband authority, authorizing statewide cable franchises for the purposes of competitive cable service, promoting the wide-spread development of high-capacity broadband internet access, and increasing the availability and quality of services in this key economic development area and ensuring the safety, reliability and affordability of telecommunications services
